label: specifiedPaymentTradeSettlement
comment: A payment trade settlement specified for this trade price.
A trade settlement payment specified for this trade settlement payment.
The payment trade settlement for this specified requirement.

rangeIncludes.comment: The information that enables the reconciliation of a payment with the item(s) that the payment is intended to settle, for example a commercial invoice.

domainIncludes.comment: Common conditions contained in a contract or agreement applicable between trading partners.
A sum of money for which something is or may be bought or sold for trade purposes.
The specific discharge obligations in respect of funds or securities transferred between two or more parties as part of a trade settlement.
